{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3271149,"name":"","username":"DoopSheep","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/d/ac91a4/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-01-02T04:13:34.154Z","cooked":"

Hi everyone!

972 Iron Claw Robotics is proud to present our 2023 season and offseason technical documents.

Vertigo 2023 Competition Robot CAD

Vertigo 2023 Competition Tech Binder

Season Recap

Offseason Turret Project CAD

Offseason Swerve CAD

Testing Bed CAD

Code

Other Team and Offseason Resources

If you have any questions, please let us know and we will do our best to answer them. If you want to contact us directly, you can email us at 972Contact@lgsuhsd.org.

We also do build season weekly blog posts with our progress through the season.

We’ll see you all in the 2024 season!

Did you manufacture and assemble the turret?

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":4,"updated_at":"2024-01-02T15:45:59.425Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":174,"readers_count":173,"score":54.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":447179,"topic_slug":"972-iron-claw-robotics-2023-offseason-release","display_username":"Totally out of touch","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":3609,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/972-iron-claw-robotics-2023-offseason-release/447179/2","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3271308,"name":"","username":"DoopSheep","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/d/ac91a4/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-01-02T16:33:19.021Z","cooked":"

All parts of the turret were ordered, manufactured, and programmed, but some parts arrived too late, so we were not able to assemble it in time for our last meeting before winter break . We will post an update when we get around to assembling it, but that may not be for a while.

turret11920×2550 313 KB

turret21920×1446 191 KB
